com.learn.android.demos.toast

类 Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.learn.android.demos.toast.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows configuring a Croutons behaviour aside from the actual view, which is defined via Style.

    This allows to re-use a Style while modifying parameters that only have to be applied when the Crouton is being displayed.

    从以下版本开始:
    1.8
    作者:
    chris

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  Configuration.Builder
      Creates a Configuration.Builder to build a Configuration upon.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static Configuration DEFAULT
      The default Configuration of a Crouton.
      static int DURATION_INFINITE
      Display a Crouton for an infinite amount of time or until Crouton.cancel() has been called.
      static int DURATION_LONG
      The default long display duration of a Crouton.
      static int DURATION_SHORT
      The default short display duration of a Crouton.
